00063 /* BMBVH_NewBVH flag parameter */
00064 enum {
00065     BMBVH_USE_CAGE        = 1, /* project geometry onto modifier cage */
00066     BMBVH_RETURN_ORIG     = 2, /* use with BMBVH_USE_CAGE, returns hits in relation to original geometry */
00067     BMBVH_RESPECT_SELECT  = 4, /* restrict to hidden geometry (overrides BMBVH_RESPECT_HIDDEN) */
00068     BMBVH_RESPECT_HIDDEN  = 8  /* omit hidden geometry */
00069 };
